Package com.composum.pages.components.model.page

Class Sitemap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.commons.model.AbstractModel
      • com.composum.pages.components.model.page.Sitemap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model, com.composum.sling.core.SlingBean
    public class Sitemap
extends AbstractModel
    Model for displaying the sitemap. To use it, you need to create a node sitemap with sling:resourceType="composum/pages/components/navigation/sitemap" below the root where you want the sitemap. Calling sitemap.xml will yield all subpages visible in the navigation and also visible in the search. Limitations: there are some optional attributes changefreq and priority in sitemaps - we don't generate those, since there are no settings for these at the pages so far.
    See Also:
    "https://www.sitemaps.org/de/protocol.html"
